message: I should add that Twitter search also sucks, but I use a Google CSE to find old Tweets. At least they can be indexed!

Impossible to find a message I wrote, and I'm pretty good at finding stuff. Sure, I could just say the same thing again, but then the rest of the thread is lost. Messages have ids, but there's no API method to display a message...
makes sense that if there is groups/:group_id.json, that there should be message/:message_id.json
